That question, repeated across a dozen environmental issues and across our diverse planet, is what will ultimately determine whether the human race is living beyond its ecological means as it pursues economic revival.

Sentence.sentence: Now Fred, you went to university in Canada?( ' ,  9 ) A recent International Labour Organization report says the deterioration of real wages around the world calls into question the true extent of an economic recovery, especially if government rescue packages are phased out too early.

Sentence.sentence: Yet the persistent question of Why do I need that? – or, perhaps more  tellingly,  Why  do  you  need  to  know  that?  –  dogs  the  steps  of  many  new  ventures.

Sentence.sentence: Those simultaneous challenges appear less  overwhelming with increasingly better answers to a centuries-old question: how to make power portable.

Sentence.sentence: We found that when we taught participants to ask What if? and How can? questions that nobody present would know the answer to and that would spark exploration, they engaged in better inquiry at the next exhibit − asking more questions, performing more experiments and making better inter pretations of their results.

Sentence.sentence: They asked both groups to generate questions about important issues needed to create recovery plans.

Sentence.sentence: The college students had cultivated the ability to ask questions, the cornerstone of critical thinking.

Sentence.sentence: Specifically, their questions became more comprehensive at the new exhibit.

Sentence.sentence: Rather than merely asking about something they wanted to try, they tended to include both cause and effect in their question.

Sentence.sentence: Perhaps many teachers have too little time to allow students to form and pursue their own questions and too much ground to cover in the curriculum.

Sentence.sentence: It helps students realize not every question has an answer.

Sentence.sentence: At the Exploratorium in San Francisco, we recently studied how learning to ask good questions can affect the quality of people's scientific inquiry.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Asking juicy questions appears to be a transferable skill for deepening collaborative inquiry into the science content found in exhibits.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But after she snapped a photo and started using her phone, he asked her a serious question: "Are you going to post that online?"

Sentence.sentence: But the next question is, are the drops in average well-being happening at the same time as trends toward increased electronic device usage?

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"问，询问"之意。
means: ask ：最普通用词，可与demand, inquire和question换用，但ask用于口语中，指提出问题让人回答。
demand ：指根据自己的权利、职责或身份认为有必要弄清情况而正式发问，常隐含命令对方回答的意味。
inquire ：较正式用词，指为得到真实情况而详细询问或调查了解。
question ：指因感到可疑或为了解情况，弄清究竟而发问，有时指一连串的发问。

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词均含"问题"之意。
means: problem ： 指客观上存在的、难以处理或难以理解的问题。
question ： 通常指用口头或书面提出来要求回答或有待讨论解决的问题。
issue ： 多指意见能达到一致的问题，着重争论或讨论中的问题。
matter ： 含义不很具体，暗示人们考虑和关心的事和话题。

stems_affixes.word_buile: question问题;询问+aire表名词或形容词→n.调查表, 问卷 adj.质问的
con全部+quest寻求,询问→全部寻求到→征服
in进入+quest寻求,询问→问进去→审问
quest寻求,询问→n.探寻,探求;寻求,追求
quest寻求,询问+ion表名词→n.问题;询问 v.询问;怀疑,对…表示疑问
question问题;询问+aire表名词或形容词→n.调查表, 问卷 adj.质问的
re再+quest寻求,询问→在寻求→请求
quest寻求,询问+ion表名词→n.问题;询问 v.询问;怀疑,对…表示疑问

means.word_mean: 问题

sentences.en: I asked you a question and you didn't answer.
sentences.cn: 我问了你一个问题, 但你没有回答。

means.word_mean: 议题; 难题; （待讨论或处理的）事情

sentences.en: At the end of the meeting, a number of important questions were still unresolved.
sentences.cn: 会议结束时, 一些重大的问题仍悬而未决。

means.word_mean: 疑问, 不能肯定的事

sentences.en: If you have any questions, ask the director.
sentences.cn: 若有问题, 你可问主任。

sentences.en: There has been some question as to whether or not the President will resign.
sentences.cn: 总统是否会辞职还不确定。

sentences.en: It's a difficult question to decide.
sentences.cn: 这是个难以决定的问题。

sentences.en: I think that I've managed to solve the question of what to buy my mother for her birthday.
sentences.cn: 我认为我自己解决了给妈妈买什么东西来作生日礼物的问题。

sentences.en: These are questions that lie outside the purview of our inquiry.
sentences.cn: 这些都不是属于我们调查范围的问题。

means.word_mean: 怀疑；犹豫
问(某人)问题; 正式提问; 质询; 问

sentences.en: I prefer questioning my pupils to lecturing them.
sentences.cn: 我喜欢少讲课, 多提问我的学生。

sentences.en: The police questioned the witness.
sentences.cn: 警察询问了证人。

means.word_mean: 对(某事物)表示[感到]怀疑

sentences.en: I would never question his honesty.
sentences.cn: 我绝不会怀疑他的诚实。

sentences.en: I question if you can do it.
sentences.cn: 我对你能否做这件事表示怀疑。

sentences.en: He questioned whether she could have arrived in time.
sentences.cn: 他怀疑她是否能准时到达。

sentences.en: It can't be questioned that we will win the final victory.
sentences.cn: 我们将最终取得胜利, 这是确定无疑的。</seg>

lj.lj_ly: Starting over is out of the question.

entry.def: A question is something that you say or write in order to ask a person about something.

example.ex: They asked a great many questions about England...
example.tran: 他们问了一大堆有关英格兰的问题。

example.ex: The President refused to answer further questions on the subject...
example.tran: 总统拒绝就这个话题再回答问题。

entry.def: If you question someone, you ask them a lot of questions about something.

example.ex: This led the therapist to question Jim about his parents and their marriage...
example.tran: 这让治疗专家问起了吉姆有关他父母及他们婚姻的情况。

example.ex: A man is being questioned by police in connection with an attack on a disabled woman.
example.tran: 警方正在询问一名涉嫌袭击一位残疾女性的男子。

entry.def: If you question something, you have or express doubts about whether it is true, reasonable, or worthwhile.

example.ex: It never occurs to them to question the doctor's decisions...
example.tran: 他们从未想过要怀疑医生的决定。

example.ex: Weber is challenging his audience to question their own beliefs.
example.tran: 韦伯正要求观众们反思质疑各自的信仰。

entry.def: If you say that there is some question about something, you mean that there is doubt or uncertainty about it. If something is in question or has been called into question, doubt or uncertainty has been expressed about it.

example.ex: There's no question about their success...
example.tran: 他们一定会成功。

example.ex: There's some question as to whether he will sign this resolution...
example.tran: 他是否会签署这项决议还不能确定。

entry.def: A question is a problem, matter, or point which needs to be considered.

example.ex: But the whole question of aid is a tricky political one...
example.tran: 但是整个援助问题是个非常复杂的政治问题。

example.ex: That decision raised questions about the secretary of state's powers and the fairness of his procedure.
example.tran: 那个决定引起人们对国务卿的权力及其做法的公平性的质疑。

entry.def: The questions in an examination are the problems which are set in order to test your knowledge or ability.

example.ex: He'd heard somewhere that the questions in economics examination papers stayed the same from year to year...
example.tran: 他从某处听说经济学考试的考题年年都一样。

example.ex: That question did come up in the examination.
example.tran: 那道题确实在考试中出现了。

entry.def: If you say 'Good question' in reply to a question, you mean that it is a difficult question to answer, or perhaps that you are embarrassed about the answer or do not know the answer.
entry.tran: 问得好，问得真有水平(用于问题难以回答、不便回答或不知道答案时)

example.ex: 'Why didn't you appoint Ron twelve months ago?'—'Good question.'
example.tran: “你为什么12个月前不任命罗恩呢？”——“问得好。”

entry.def: The person, thing, or time in question is one which you have just been talking about or which is relevant.
entry.tran: 被提及的;讨论中的;相关的

example.ex: The player in question is Mark Williams...
example.tran: 我们所说的那个选手是马克·威廉斯。

example.ex: Add up all the income you've received over the period in question.
example.tran: 把那个时期里你拿到的所有收入加在一起。

entry.def: If you say that something is out of the question, you are emphasizing that it is completely impossible or unacceptable.
entry.tran: 不可能;办不到;无法接受

example.ex: For the homeless, private medical care is simply out of the question...
example.tran: 对于无家可归的人而言，私人医疗纯粹是天方夜谭。

example.ex: Is a tax increase still out of the question?
example.tran: 增加税收仍然是不可能的事吗？

entry.def: If you pop the question, you ask someone to marry you.

example.ex: Stuart got serious quickly and popped the question six months later.
example.tran: 斯图尔特很快认真起来，6个月之后便求婚了。

entry.def: If you say there is no question of something happening, you are emphasizing that it is not going to happen.

example.ex: As far as he was concerned there was no question of betraying his own comrades...
example.tran: 就他而言，背叛自己的同志是不可能的。

example.ex: There is no question of the taxpayer picking up the bill for the party.
example.tran: 要纳税人为该党买单是不可能的。

entry.def: If you do something without question, you do it without arguing or asking why it is necessary.
entry.tran: 毫无疑问地;毫无异议地

example.ex: ...military formations, carrying out without question the battle orders of superior officers.
example.tran: 毫无异议地执行上级军官的战斗命令的部队编队

entry.def: You use without question to emphasize the opinion you are expressing.
entry.tran: 毫无疑问(表示强调自己的观点)

example.ex: He was our greatest storyteller, without question.
example.tran: 毫无疑问，他是我们最会讲故事的人。

means.word_mean: 1. an instance of questioning;

sentences.sentence: "there was a question about my training"
"we made inquiries of all those who were present"

means.word_mean: 2. the subject matter at issue;

sentences.sentence: "the question of disease merits serious discussion"
"under the head of minor Roman poets"

means.word_mean: 3. a sentence of inquiry that asks for a reply;
4. uncertainty about the truth or factuality of existence of something;

sentences.sentence: "there is no question about the validity of the enterprise"

means.word_mean: 5. a formal proposal for action made to a deliberative assembly for discussion and vote;
6. an informal reference to a marriage proposal;

sentences.sentence: "he was ready to pop the question"

means.word_mean: 1. challenge the accuracy, probity, or propriety of;

sentences.sentence: "We must question your judgment in this matter"

means.word_mean: 2. pose a series of questions to;

sentences.sentence: "The suspect was questioned by the police"
"We questioned the survivor about the details of the explosion"

means.word_mean: 3. pose a question
4. conduct an interview in television, newspaper, and radio reporting
5. place in doubt or express doubtful speculation;

sentences.sentence: "I wonder whether this was the right thing to do"
"she wondered whether it would snow tonight"

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Old French question (noun), questionner (verb), from Latin quaestio(n-), from quaerere 'ask, seek'

sentences.cn: 提出 / 回答问题
sentences.en: to ask/answer a question

sentences.cn: 第3题难极了。
sentences.en: Question 3 was very difficult.

sentences.cn: 考试时准有关于能量的题目。
sentences.en: In the exam there's sure to be a question on energy.

sentences.cn: 问题是他们打算付给你多少钱？
sentences.en: The question is, how much are they going to pay you?

sentences.cn: 问题是，他对局势是否了解。
sentences.en: (formal) The question arises as to whether or not he knew of the situation.

sentences.cn: 泄漏究竟是怎么造成的，这一关键问题仍未得到答案。
sentences.en: The key question of what caused the leak remains unanswered.

sentences.cn: 他就最近的改革措施向部长提了一个问题。
sentences.en: (formal)He put a question to the minister about the recent reforms.

sentences.cn: 我希望警方不要提出难应付的问题。
sentences.en: I hope the police don't ask any awkward questions .

sentences.cn: 他们问了一大堆有关英格兰的问题。
sentences.en: They asked a great many questions about England...

sentences.cn: 总统拒绝就这个话题再回答问题。
sentences.en: The President refused to answer further questions on the subject...

sentences.cn: 这让治疗专家问起了吉姆有关他父母及他们婚姻的情况。
sentences.en: This led the therapist to question Jim about his parents and their marriage...

sentences.cn: 警方正在询问一名涉嫌袭击一位残疾女性的男子。
sentences.en: A man is being questioned by police in connection with an attack on a disabled woman.

sentences.cn: 他们从未想过要怀疑医生的决定。
sentences.en: It never occurs to them to question the doctor's decisions...

sentences.cn: 韦伯正要求观众们反思质疑各自的信仰。
sentences.en: Weber is challenging his audience to question their own beliefs.

sentences.cn: 他们一定会成功。
sentences.en: There's no question about their success...

sentences.cn: 他是否会签署这项决议还不能确定。
sentences.en: There's some question as to whether he will sign this resolution...

sentences.cn: 但是整个援助问题是个非常复杂的政治问题。
sentences.en: But the whole question of aid is a tricky political one...

sentences.cn: 那个决定引起人们对国务卿的权力及其做法的公平性的质疑。
sentences.en: That decision raised questions about the secretary of state's powers and the fairness of his procedure.

sentences.cn: 他从某处听说经济学考试的考题年年都一样。
sentences.en: He'd heard somewhere that the questions in economics examination papers stayed the same from year to year...

sentences.cn: 那道题确实在考试中出现了。
sentences.en: That question did come up in the examination.

sentences.cn: “你为什么12个月前不任命罗恩呢？”——“问得好。”
sentences.en: 'Why didn't you appoint Ron twelve months ago?'—'Good question.'

sentences.cn: 我们所说的那个选手是马克·威廉斯。
sentences.en: The player in question is Mark Williams...

sentences.cn: 把那个时期里你拿到的所有收入加在一起。
sentences.en: Add up all the income you've received over the period in question.

sentences.cn: 对于无家可归的人而言，私人医疗纯粹是天方夜谭。
sentences.en: For the homeless, private medical care is simply out of the question...

sentences.cn: 增加税收仍然是不可能的事吗？
sentences.en: Is a tax increase still out of the question?

sentences.cn: 斯图尔特很快认真起来，6个月之后便求婚了。
sentences.en: Stuart got serious quickly and popped the question six months later.

sentences.cn: 就他而言，背叛自己的同志是不可能的。
sentences.en: As far as he was concerned there was no question of betraying his own comrades...

sentences.cn: 要纳税人为该党买单是不可能的。
sentences.en: There is no question of the taxpayer picking up the bill for the party.

sentences.cn: 毫无异议地执行上级军官的战斗命令的部队编队
sentences.en: ...military formations, carrying out without question the battle orders of superior officers.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，他是我们最会讲故事的人。
sentences.en: He was our greatest storyteller, without question.

sentences.cn: 提出 / 回答问题
sentences.en: to ask/answer a question

sentences.cn: 问题是他们打算付给你多少钱？
sentences.en: The question is, how much are they going to pay you?

sentences.cn: 问题是，他对局势是否了解。
sentences.en: (formal) The question arises as to whether or not he knew of the situation.

sentences.cn: 泄漏究竟是怎么造成的，这一关键问题仍未得到答案。
sentences.en: The key question of what caused the leak remains unanswered.

sentences.cn: 他就最近的改革措施向部长提了一个问题。
sentences.en: (formal)He put a question to the minister about the recent reforms.

sentences.cn: 我希望警方不要提出难应付的问题。
sentences.en: I hope the police don't ask any awkward questions .

sentences.cn: 在面试中要尽量问易于发挥的问题，不要让对方回答“是”或“否”了事。
sentences.en: In an interview try to ask open questions that don't just need ‘Yes ’ or ‘No ’ as an answer.

sentences.cn: 咱们来看一下保安问题。
sentences.en: Let's look at the question of security.

sentences.cn: 需要面对的是资金问题。
sentences.en: The question which needs to be addressed is one of funding.

sentences.cn: 哪条路线较好，是悬而未决的问题。
sentences.en: Which route is better remains an open question (= it is not decided) .

sentences.cn: 这家企业的倒闭只是时间问题。
sentences.en: It's merely a question of time before the business collapses.

sentences.cn: 那只是个确定你真正想要什么的问题。
sentences.en: It's just a question of deciding what you really want.

sentences.cn: 学生被问到有关他们所学课本内容的问题。
sentences.en: The students were questioned on the books they had been studying.

sentences.cn: 他们问了一大堆有关英格兰的问题。
sentences.en: They asked a great many questions about England...

sentences.cn: 总统拒绝就这个话题再回答问题。
sentences.en: The President refused to answer further questions on the subject...

sentences.cn: 但是整个援助问题是个非常复杂的政治问题。
sentences.en: But the whole question of aid is a tricky political one...

sentences.cn: 这正是这项新研究需要解决的问题。
sentences.en: That's the question behind this new research.

sentences.cn: 最重要的是，它们希望研究一个根本的问题：人类是否真正了解自己所生存的世界？
sentences.en: Above all, they would hope to study a fundamental question: Are humans actually aware of the world they live in?

sentences.cn: 上述情况和其他类似事件引发了一个问题：司法和政治之间是否还存在界限。
sentences.en: This and other similar cases raise the question of whether there is still a line between the court and politics.

sentences.cn: 越来越多的研究者和组织正在认真思考这个问题。
sentences.en: A growing number of researchers and organisations are now thinking seriously about that question.

sentences.cn: “但是，当市场和世界形势发生变化时,我们所做之事没有意义的话,我们将会遇到类似的问题。
sentences.en: “But we’re going to have questions like that where we have things we’re doing that don’t make sense when the market changes and the world changes.

sentences.cn: 半个多世纪以来，国内生产总值以及其有效性问题一直使决策者头疼不已。
sentences.en: The question of GDP and its usefulness has annoyed policymakers for over half a century.

sentences.cn: 重要的问题在于，谁该从基于我们生活现在形成的数据分析中得益？
sentences.en: The great question is who should benefit from the analysis of all the data that our lives now generate.

sentences.cn: 不久前，这个问题听起来可能会很奇怪。
sentences.en: The question would have sounded strange not long ago.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,创造业在近几十年来受了重创,并且更多贸易协定引发了这样的问题:就是关于新的冲击是否会对制造业产生不良影响。
sentences.en: Without question, manufacturing has taken a significant hit during recent decades, and further trade deals raise questions about whether new shocks could hit manufacturing.

sentences.cn: 所以不要是怯于问更私人的问题。
sentences.en: So don't be afraid to ask more personal questions.

sentences.cn: at the next exhibit — asking more questions, performing moreexperiments and making better interpretations of their results.研究发现，当我们引导参与者去问“假使……将会怎么样”和“怎么能……”这类现在没有人知道答案但能激发他们探索精神的问题时，他们会在下次展览活动中更好地参与探究，即提出更多的问题、做更多的试验、并且对他们的结果进行更合理的解释。
sentences.en: We found that when we taught participants to ask  “ What if? ” and  “ How can? ”questions that nobody present would know the answer to and that would  spark exploration, they engaged in better inquiry
sentences.from: 15年12月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问，他是我们最会讲故事的人。
sentences.en: He was our greatest storyteller, without question.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,创造业在近几十年来受了重创,并且更多贸易协定引发了这样的问题:就是关于新的冲击是否会对制造业产生不良影响。
sentences.en: Without question, manufacturing has taken a significant hit during recent decades, and further trade deals raise questions about whether new shocks could hit manufacturing.

sentences.cn: “基于这项分析可知，本系统内的各机构的运作非常有效，这就对实行大规模外包倡议的价值提出了疑问。”
sentences.en: “System institutions are operating very efficiently based on this analysis, raising the question of the value of pursuing a broad scale outsourcing initiative.”
sentences.from: 17年6月六级真题（第二套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 一项新的研究对此 (26) 提出质疑，对是否真的可以以性别区分大脑表示疑问。
sentences.en: A new study 26 challenges that belief, questioning whether brains really can be distinguished by gender.
sentences.from: 16年12月四级真题（第一套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 哈佛大学已故的Richard Hackman 曾表示：“毫无疑问，团队有可能创造奇迹，催生出非凡的事物……④但是不能太依赖团队。”
sentences.en: The late Richard Hackman of Harvard University once argued, “I have no question that when you have a team, the possibility exists that it will generate magic,producing something extraordinary… ④ But don’t count on it.”
sentences.from: 17年6月四级真题（第三套）| 阅读

sentences.cn: 服务装修网友, 解决装修疑问.
sentences.en: User service decoration, decoration resolve the question.

sentences.cn: 作为演员, 我甚至没有产生过这样的疑问.
sentences.en: In my work as an actress, I don't even pose such a question.

sentences.cn: 您对USPAP有任何的批评意见 、 疑问或建议, 都请与ASB联系.
sentences.en: If you have any comments, questions, or suggestions regarding USPAP, please contact the ASB.

sentences.cn: 我只会在适当的时候透露有疑问物品的下落.
sentences.en: I will reveal the whereabouts of the item in question only at the appropriate time.

sentences.cn: 在实际中,有关利率的变动方式则是毫无疑问的.
sentences.en: And no question about which way things work in practice.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问奔弛有着辉煌的过去.
sentences.en: There was no question that Benz had a respectable past.

sentences.cn: 欧盟官员也对利润方面产生了疑问.
sentences.en: EU officials have questioned the profitability.

sentences.cn: 你还有什么对盐湖的疑问,问题馆一定帮你解答.
sentences.en: Our Q & A Box would help you answer your questions related to the Salt Lake.

sentences.cn: 如有任何疑问,请随时联系我们的在线客服.
sentences.en: Please feel free to contact our Live Help any time for any question youhave.

sentences.cn: 你在填表时遇到任何难题或疑问 吗 ?
sentences.en: Did you have any problems or questions about the evaluation?
sentences.from: 常春藤生活英语杂志-2006年1月号

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,他是我们队里最优秀的运动员.
sentences.en: He is out of question the best player in our team.

sentences.cn: 如果你有任何疑问, 请随时打断我.
sentences.en: If you have any questions, please feel free to interrupt at any time.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,克莱斯勒公司有着光辉的历史.
sentences.en: There was no question that Chrysler had a respectable past.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问,他最适合干这份工作.
sentences.en: He is without question the best man for the job.

sentences.cn: 如果您有什么疑问 、 建议或者评论,请发邮件给上面的几位.
sentences.en: Please feel free to email any of the above for questions, suggestions or comments.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问, 这是他的字迹.
sentences.en: Out of question, it is his handwriting.

sentences.cn: 齐塔人说, 毫无疑问, 地球晃动应该为此承担责任.
sentences.en: Per the Zetas, wobble is to blame, no question.

sentences.cn: 若有任何疑问, 请致电我们, 我们将在第一时间给您最真诚的答复!
sentences.en: If you have any questions, please contact us, we will reply as soon as possible!

sentences.cn: 列有谘询机构、资料守则 、 就业服务 、 雇员权益 、 劳工法例 、 刊物及疑问解答等.
sentences.en: List consultative boards, employment services, employee rights & benefits, labour legislation, publications and frequently asked questions etc.

sentences.cn: 试比较which和what用作限定词和代词时,在疑问句中的用法.
sentences.en: Compare the use of which and what as determiners and pronouns in questions.

sentences.cn: 把下列句子变成疑问句, 要用被动语态.
sentences.en: Change the following sentences into questions, using the Passive Voice.

sentences.cn: 毫无疑问中央政府正向港府逐步施压要取缔法轮功.
sentences.en: There is no question of Beijing mounting pressure on the SAR to ban the sect.

sentences.cn: 士兵们毫无疑问地信服了公主的权威.
sentences.en: The soldiers obeyed her authority without question.

sentences.cn: 他的诚实是毫无疑问的.
sentences.en: There is no question about his honesty.

sentences.cn: 因此,当潜在客户们听到那些引起疑问的声明时, 他们经常会皱起眉头发问.
sentences.en: Therefore when prospects hear claims that could be questioned, they are often a raised eyebrow.

sentences.cn: 这宗案件引起了对整个法律宗旨的怀疑。
sentences.en: This case brings into question the whole purpose of the law.

sentences.cn: 他说什么我就接受什么。我从未想过要去怀疑它。
sentences.en: I just accepted what he told me. I never thought to question it.

sentences.cn: 对她的判断从没有人表示过怀疑。
sentences.en: No one has ever questioned her judgement.

sentences.cn: 他怀疑事故是否应归咎于卡车司机一人。
sentences.en: He questioned whether the accident was solely the truck driver's fault.

sentences.cn: 他们从未想过要怀疑医生的决定。
sentences.en: It never occurs to them to question the doctor's decisions...

sentences.cn: 财务会计准则委员会主席鲍勃·赫兹对那些“怀疑委员会动机”的人表达了强烈的不满。
sentences.en: Bob Herz, the FASB's chairman, cried out against those who“ question our motives.”

sentences.cn: 布鲁克斯女士可能会也可能不会对她的记者是如何得到新闻故事的有所怀疑,但是她没有质疑、不做指示,也没有得到可追踪、有记录的答案。
sentences.en: Ms Brooks may or may not have had suspicions about how her journalists got their stories, but she asked no questions, gave no instructions—nor received traceable, recorded answers.

sentences.cn: " 威尔克斯太太的话, 你就不必怀疑了."阿尔奇说. 他的胡子也翘了起来.
sentences.en: " Don't you question Miz Wilkes'word,'said Archie, his beard bristling.

sentences.cn: 当你为了一些鸡毛蒜皮、无关紧要的事情愤怒不已时, 我怀疑你的智商.
sentences.en: When you get angry over some stupid little pointless thing, I question your intelligence.

sentences.cn: 到他们不再怀疑正统说法之日, 便是人类放弃追求真理之时.
sentences.en: When they ( scientists ) stop questioning orthodoxy, mankind will have given up the search for truth.

sentences.cn: 大多数人盲目的相信媒体的报道,从不怀疑它们的真实性.
sentences.en: Most of the people follow the media like sheep and never question their truthfulness.

sentences.cn: 他怀疑这幅画不是毕加索画的.
sentences.en: He questioned the attribution of the painting to Picasso.

sentences.cn: 我怀疑借这么一大笔钱是否明智.
sentences.en: I would question the wisdom of borrowing such a large sum of money.

sentences.cn: 对此毫不怀疑.
sentences.en: I make no question of it.

sentences.cn: 没人怀疑她能胜任这项工作.
sentences.en: No one questions her fitness for the job.

sentences.cn: 我怀疑这些数字的准确性.
sentences.en: I call in question the accuracy of these figures.

sentences.cn: 我对你能否做这件事表示怀疑.
sentences.en: I question if you can do it.

sentences.cn: 我怀疑他的故事是否真实.
sentences.en: I question the truth of his story.

sentences.cn: 在家里,是艾尔弗雷德·罗伯茨说了算,他说什么, 就是什么,不容许表示任何怀疑.
sentences.en: At home Alfred Roberts roost , and there was no question that what he said went.

sentences.cn: 你怀疑他的诚实 吗 ?
sentences.en: Do you question his honesty?

sentences.cn: 对我们的魔王产生怀疑? 你为什么会那样想?
sentences.en: Question our Sovereign? You would consider that?

sentences.cn: 谁怀疑我们领导革命战争的能力,谁就会陷进机会主义的泥坑里去.
sentences.en: Whoever questions our ability to lead the revolutionary war will fall into the morass of opportunism.

sentences.cn: 差不多两千年来,没有人对他的想法提出怀疑.
sentences.en: No one questioned his ideas for almost 2,000 years.

sentences.cn: 我决不会对她的诚实有所怀疑.
sentences.en: I would never question her honesty.

sentences.cn: 如果你怀疑这样一个便宜的滑动开关(连同它上面的SO239同轴电缆插座)是否有效, 那么请继续看下去.
sentences.en: If you question the use of a cheap slide switch and SO 239 coax sockets, read on.

sentences.cn: 但是现在, 即使小问题也招来人们对你智慧的怀疑与质问.
sentences.en: Now , however, even minor problems are triggering unsettling doubts and questions about the wisdom of plans.

sentences.cn: 他们从未想过要怀疑医生的决定.
sentences.en: It never occurs to them to question the doctor's decisions.

sentences.cn: 人们应当对某种超自然的力量保持完全的信仰,并且对祂的裁决不做怀疑和争论.
sentences.en: Every person should have complete faith in some supernatural power whose decisions he obeys without question.

sentences.cn: 我很怀疑,这个计划是不是行得通.
sentences.en: I very much question whether this plan is practicable.

sentences.cn: 我们必须怀疑你对这件事的判断.
sentences.en: We must question your judgment in this matter.

sentences.cn: 但是她说的几个重要的议题和问题正在所有的浪潮中消失.
sentences.en: But she says several important issues and questions are getting lost in all the excitement.

sentences.cn: 增补新条文之议题经提出待议,随即付诸表决, 并获通过.
sentences.en: Question the addition of the new clauses proposed, put and agreed to.

sentences.cn: 设计一系列的发问题目,用来量化你自选的政策议题.
sentences.en: Write a series of questions designed to measure opinion in your area of interest.

sentences.cn: 经修正的条例草案第3条之议题经付诸表决, 并获通过.
sentences.en: Question on clause 3, as amended, put and agreed to.

sentences.cn: 在开始一个议题时,一般会用开放性的问题,便于被访谈者展开思路.
sentences.en: Always start a topic with open questions helping the respondent to open andthein confirming your understanding.

sentences.cn: 你还有什么对盐湖的疑问,问题馆一定帮你解答.
sentences.en: Our Q & A Box would help you answer your questions related to the Salt Lake.

sentences.cn: 在我授课时请多问问题.
sentences.en: Please ask questions as I go along.

sentences.cn: 关于上面的图片问问题.
sentences.en: Ask questions about the pictures above.

sentences.cn: 讲一讲顾问问题.
sentences.en: Now let me speak briefly on the question of advisers.

sentences.cn: 这是一个你问问题、结帐并且还图书馆书的地方.
sentences.en: This is where you go to ask questions and check out and return library books.

sentences.cn: 他不停地问问题, 问那些无法回避的问题.
sentences.en: He was asking questions, unavoidable questions, persistently.

sentences.cn: 什么东西从不问问题,但是得到很多回应?
sentences.en: What is something that never asks any questions but demands a great many answers?

sentences.cn: 收到听众“炮轰式”提问, 问题均关乎技术细节.
sentences.en: Received audience shelling to ask questions, questions about the technical details.

sentences.cn: 我觉得要是他让我来问问题, 我会很欢迎.
sentences.en: I think if he asks me to ask questions, I will welcome it.

sentences.cn: 孩子们喜欢问问题.
sentences.en: Children are given to asking questions.

sentences.cn: 这孩子总是不停地问问题.
sentences.en: The child persisted and kept asking questions.

sentences.cn: 问. 问题. 为什么? 回答. 反馈.
sentences.en: Asking. Question. Why? Answering. Feedback.

sentences.cn: 你前进时,必须问问题.
sentences.en: You need to ask questions as you go along.

sentences.cn: 尽管在这一集里主要介绍的是询问问题,William对Hogan的答案总是不太满意.
sentences.en: Although this episode is asking question William is not always satisfied with the answers Hogan offers.

sentences.cn: 山姆: 先吹蜡烛, 再问问题.
sentences.en: Sam: Blow out the candles. Then ask questions.

sentences.cn: 你总喜欢通过问问题来追求更多的问题.
sentences.en: And you have a way of asking questions that beg more question.

sentences.cn: 这是25年来民意测验专家所问问题得到的最消极反应.
sentences.en: The response is the most negative in the 25 years pollsters have asked the question.

sentences.cn: 聚集拢来的鸥群一天天扩大, 有来问问题的,有来膜拜的, 有来嘲弄的,不一而足.
sentences.en: The crowd grew larger every day, coming to question, to idolize, to scorn.

sentences.cn: 要学会问问题,向同学问, 向教授问, 向助教问.
sentences.en: Learn how to ask questions of your fellow students, your professors, and your TAs.

sentences.cn: 尽量不让他们问问题(作到先发制人).
sentences.en: Try to forestall their questions.

sentences.cn: 在进行的同时,我们可以停下来问问题 吗 ?
sentences.en: Are we going to be allowed to stop and ask questions as we go along?

sentences.cn: 在必要时问问题.
sentences.en: Ask questions if necessary.

sentences.cn: 一个好的聆听者应该善于问问题.
sentences.en: A good listener be good at asking questions.

sentences.cn: 比尔: 阿里是个活跃的孩子, 他很爱问问题.
sentences.en: Bill: Ali's an active boy. He asks a lot of questions.

sentences.cn: “有一位人高马大的护士大声冲我问问题, ”迈克尔说.
sentences.en: Well, there was a big burly nurse shouting questions at me, said Michael.

sentences.cn: '——'我喜欢(通过言谈进行的)分析, 当我被问问题的时候, 我尝试回答它们.
sentences.en: I like discussions, and when I am asked questions, I try to anser them.

sentences.cn: 问问题并不说明你已远远落后他人.
sentences.en: Asking questions doesn't mean you are far behind others.

sentences.cn: 问问题并不说明你无知.
sentences.en: Asking questions doesn't mean are ignorant.

sentences.cn: 他不以问问题为耻.
sentences.en: He is not above asking questions.

sentences.cn: 问问题并不说明你有疑惑.
sentences.en: Asking questions doesn't mean you are confused.

Sentence.sentence: The question is, how?Lawrence Patihis at the University of Southern Mississippi recently studied around 20 people with HSAM and found that they scored particularly highly on two measures: fantasy proneness ( ' ,  倾向) and absorption.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The late Richard Hackman of Harvard University once argued, I have no question that when you have a team, the possibility exists that it will generate magic, producing something extraordinary… But don't count on it.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Some team members find it hard to agree on questions like membership and the team's purpose.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: A good rule of thumb is that as soon as generals and hospital administrators jump on a management bandwagon ( ' ,  追随一种管理潮流), it is time to ask questions.
Sentence.come: 出自-2017年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Researchers from the University of Connecticut Health Center asked the residents a large number of questions about their quality of life, emotional well-being and social interaction, as well as about the quality of the facilities.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But what effect does your personality have on your longevity ( ' ,  长寿)? Do some kinds of personalities lead to longer lives? A new study in the Journal of the American Geriatrics Society looked at this question by examining the personality characteristics of 246 children of people who had lived to be at least 100.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: The team behind the article and video in question make no mention of the system, or whether or not it detected them.
Sentence.come: 出自-2016年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Today, there is a serious question about this issue: Should there be a minimum age limit for executing criminals? In other words, is it right for convicted murderers who kill when they are minors—that is under the age of 18—to receive the death penalty?.
Sentence.come: 出自-2015年12月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: The question of whether our government should promote science and technology or the liberal arts in higher education isn't an either/or proposition(命题),although the current emphasis on preparing young Americans for STEM（science, technology, engineering, maths）-related fields can make it seem that way.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There is no question that the United States imports a great deal of energy and, in fact, relies on that steady flow to maintain its economy
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: They'll be able to answer the questions of students who are in their class directly via the interactive book.
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: While such vigilant（警觉的）tracking of cancer is a good thing in general, researchers are increasingly questioning whether all of this testing is necessary for the elderly.
Sentence.come: 出自-2012年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But even before its release, the report drew criticism from some experts on climate and risk, who questioned its methods and conclusions.
Sentence.come: 出自-2011年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Her main reason for returning to academia mid-career was to take advantage of the greater freedom to choose research questions.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年12月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: But as reliance on the Web grows, there are signs that the question is getting more serious attention: Last month, a study published in CNS Spectrums claimed to be the first large-scale look at excessive Internet use.
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: There's no question that there're people who're seriously in trouble because they're overdoing their Internet involvement," said psychiatrist (精神科医生) Ivan Goldberg
Sentence.come: 出自-2010年6月阅读原文

Sentence.sentence: Maybe you will put question marks in the margin when you don't understand something and before an exam.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Most students write questions or short notes in the margins.
Sentence.come: 出自-2014年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: What question did the man ask the woman？ M: Lisa, Lisa
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: Jones, and would you like to ask me any questions?
Sentence.come: 出自-2013年6月听力原文

Sentence.sentence: In 1970, a national survey showed that 37 percent of the people questioned felt their privacy was being invaded.

Sentence.sentence: I am making my way through Columbia University, surrounded by students who quickly supply the verbal answer while I am still processing the question.

Sentence.sentence: I just want to ask them one question, so it's much easier for me just to text message.

Sentence.sentence: The journalist Ian Leslie, in his new and enjoyable book Curious: The Desire to Know and Why Your Future Depends on it, insists that the answer to that last question is "Yes".
Sentence.come: 2017年12月四级真题（第二套）阅读 Section B

Sentence.sentence: The-doctors response to the question of whether or not dogs can fall in love like humans do was a straight "Of course!" He went on to say that if love is defined as a long term commitment meaning dogs seek one another out when they're apart, they're happy
Sentence.come: 2019年12月四级真题（第二套）听力 Section C

Sentence.sentence: There's no question people can take things a long way toward reversing diabetes, reversing high blood pressure, even preventing cancer by food choices.
